title: Mosaic Uprising
outcome: The erased and 'amnesiac' citizens organize massive open assemblies in every district, calling for consensus-based governance to replace the BCI. Suspicion of technocrats is high; all past records are openly debated. The Council loses legitimacy as ordinary residents reclaim political life, publicly confronting surviving Council figures and dismantling the vestiges of the system's power.

events.description: District-wide assemblies form, gathering in open squares to discuss the city's future. Council members are called to account in public, non-algorithmic forums.
Residents openly challenge former BCI operators and technocrats for their role in past injustices. All former compliance records are debated and, where possible, revoked by group consensus.

Inter-district delegates, chosen by open show of hands, begin drafting a new civic code to replace BCI mechanisms. Surviving Council members are publicly asked to justify their continued role, sparking fierce debate.
The first Mosaic Manifesto is read aloud in every district, formally renouncing algorithmic governance. A citywide celebration marks the symbolic end of the BCI era.
